metadata.title: CVE-2024-27423 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netrom: Fix a data-race aroundsysctl_netrom_transport_requested_window_sizeWe need to protect the reader reading the sysctl value because thevalue can be changed concurrently.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
